      "6992cd70-d8b2-47f4-8681-43c329a0a6cd": {
        "role": "comment_only",
        "value": {
          "alive": true,
          "created_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_table": "notion_user",
          "created_time": 1551949799247,
          "id": "6992cd70-d8b2-47f4-8681-43c329a0a6cd",
          "ignore_block_count": true,
          "last_edited_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_table": "notion_user",
          "last_edited_time": 1594618380000,
          "parent_id": "f1363234-a7f7-409a-8af5-7f4e03f7b07b",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["JavaScript"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "var canvas=document.createElement(\"canvas\");\nvar ctx=canvas.getContext(\"2d\");\ndocument.body.appendChild(canvas);\n\n// draw an opaque shape -- here we use a rounded rectangle\ndefineRoundedRect(30,30,100,75,10);\n\n// set shadowing\nctx.shadowColor='black';\nctx.shadowBlur=10;\n\n// stroke the shadowed rounded rectangle\nctx.lineWidth=4;\nctx.stroke();\n\n// stop shadowing\nctx.shadowColor='rgba(0,0,0,0)';\n\n// set compositing to erase everything outside the stroke\nctx.globalCompositeOperation='destination-in';\nctx.fill();\n\n// set compositing to erase everything outside the stroke\nctx.globalCompositeOperation='destination-over';\nctx.fillStyle='gold';\nctx.fill();\n\n// always clean up -- set compsiting back to default\nctx.globalCompositeOperation='source-over';   \n\nfunction defineRoundedRect(x,y,width,height,radius) {\n    ctx.beginPath();\n    ctx.moveTo(x + radius, y);\n    ctx.lineTo(x + width - radius, y);\n    ctx.quadraticCurveTo(x + width, y, x + width, y + radius);\n    ctx.lineTo(x + width, y + height - radius);\n    ctx.quadraticCurveTo(x + width, y + height, x + width - radius, y + height);\n    ctx.lineTo(x + radius, y + height);\n    ctx.quadraticCurveTo(x, y + height, x, y + height - radius);\n    ctx.lineTo(x, y + radius);\n    ctx.quadraticCurveTo(x, y, x + radius, y);\n    ctx.closePath();\n}"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 7
        }
      },
      "6a8de5c3-8508-47be-8e25-39429cc80ca8": {
        "role": "comment_only",
        "value": {
          "alive": true,
          "created_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",

      "7da64317-007a-47c2-bfd0-e1aacc407428": {
        "role": "comment_only",
        "value": {
          "alive": true,
          "created_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_table": "notion_user",
          "created_time": 1551949799245,
          "id": "7da64317-007a-47c2-bfd0-e1aacc407428",
          "ignore_block_count": true,
          "last_edited_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_table": "notion_user",
          "last_edited_time": 1551949799245,
          "parent_id": "f1363234-a7f7-409a-8af5-7f4e03f7b07b",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "title": [
              ["Fill the shape.", [["b"]]],
              [
                " This causes the stroke and inner-shadow to remain while the outer shadow is erased. "
              ],
              [
                "Well, not exactly! Since a stroke is half-inside and half-outside the filled shape, the outside half of the stroke will be erased also. The fix is to double the ",
                [["i"]]
              ],
              ["context.lineWidth", [["i"], ["c"]]],
              [
                " so half of the double-sized stroke is still inside the filled shape.",
                [["i"]]
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "numbered_list",
          "version": 1
        }
      },
      "8fa5c8d6-73dc-4cae-8a9c-9511fa5c98a4": {

          "alive": true,

          "last_edited_time": 1551949799244,
          "parent_id": "f1363234-a7f7-409a-8af5-7f4e03f7b07b",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "title": [
              ["To create strokes with an inner-shadow, use "],
              ["destination-in", [["c"]]],
              [
                " compositing which causes existing content to remain only where existing content is overlapped by new content. Existing content that is not overlapped by new content is erased."
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "text",
          "version": 1

      "9137ae5f-201e-46b0-a5c2-08b9ccda7c1b": {
        "role": "comment_only",
        "value": {
          "alive": true,
          "created_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_table": "notion_user",
          "created_time": 1551949799245,
          "id": "9137ae5f-201e-46b0-a5c2-08b9ccda7c1b",
          "ignore_block_count": true,
          "last_edited_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_table": "notion_user",
          "last_edited_time": 1594618380000,
          "parent_id": "f1363234-a7f7-409a-8af5-7f4e03f7b07b",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["JavaScript"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "var canvas=document.createElement(\"canvas\");\nvar ctx=canvas.getContext(\"2d\");\ndocument.body.appendChild(canvas);\n\n// draw an opaque shape -- here we use a rounded rectangle\ndefineRoundedRect(30,30,100,75,10);\n\n// set shadowing\nctx.shadowColor='black';\nctx.shadowBlur=10;\n\n// stroke the shadowed rounded rectangle\nctx.lineWidth=4;\nctx.stroke();\n\n// set compositing to erase everything outside the stroke\nctx.globalCompositeOperation='destination-in';\nctx.fill();\n\n// always clean up -- set compsiting back to default\nctx.globalCompositeOperation='source-over';\n\nfunction defineRoundedRect(x,y,width,height,radius) {\n    ctx.beginPath();\n    ctx.moveTo(x + radius, y);\n    ctx.lineTo(x + width - radius, y);\n    ctx.quadraticCurveTo(x + width, y, x + width, y + radius);\n    ctx.lineTo(x + width, y + height - radius);\n    ctx.quadraticCurveTo(x + width, y + height, x + width - radius, y + height);\n    ctx.lineTo(x + radius, y + height);\n    ctx.quadraticCurveTo(x, y + height, x, y + height - radius);\n    ctx.lineTo(x, y + radius);\n    ctx.quadraticCurveTo(x, y, x + radius, y);\n    ctx.closePath();\n}"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 11
        }
      },

      "e0b90c64-3393-409a-8f51-a8cacaaed782": {
        "role": "comment_only",
        "value": {
          "alive": true,
          "created_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_table": "notion_user",
          "created_time": 1551949799247,
          "id": "e0b90c64-3393-409a-8f51-a8cacaaed782",
          "ignore_block_count": true,
          "last_edited_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_table": "notion_user",
          "last_edited_time": 1594618380000,
          "parent_id": "f1363234-a7f7-409a-8af5-7f4e03f7b07b",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["JavaScript"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "var canvas=document.createElement(\"canvas\");\nvar ctx=canvas.getContext(\"2d\");\ndocument.body.appendChild(canvas);\n\n// define an opaque shape -- here we use a rounded rectangle\ndefineRoundedRect(30-500,30,100,75,10);\n\n// set shadowing\nctx.shadowColor='black';\nctx.shadowBlur=10;\nctx.shadowOffsetX=500;\n\n// stroke the shadowed rounded rectangle\nctx.lineWidth=4;\nctx.stroke();\n\n// stop shadowing\nctx.shadowColor='rgba(0,0,0,0)';\n\n// redefine an opaque shape -- here we use a rounded rectangle\ndefineRoundedRect(30,30,100,75,10);\n\n// set compositing to erase everything outside the stroke\nctx.globalCompositeOperation='destination-in';\nctx.fill();\n\n// set compositing to erase everything outside the stroke\nctx.globalCompositeOperation='destination-over';\nctx.fillStyle='gold';\nctx.fill();\n\n// always clean up -- set compsiting back to default\nctx.globalCompositeOperation='source-over';   \n\nfunction defineRoundedRect(x,y,width,height,radius) {\n    ctx.beginPath();\n    ctx.moveTo(x + radius, y);\n    ctx.lineTo(x + width - radius, y);\n    ctx.quadraticCurveTo(x + width, y, x + width, y + radius);\n    ctx.lineTo(x + width, y + height - radius);\n    ctx.quadraticCurveTo(x + width, y + height, x + width - radius, y + height);\n    ctx.lineTo(x + radius, y + height);\n    ctx.quadraticCurveTo(x, y + height, x, y + height - radius);\n    ctx.lineTo(x, y + radius);\n    ctx.quadraticCurveTo(x, y, x + radius, y);\n    ctx.closePath();\n}"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 7
        }
      },

      "ff9876c4-8613-4619-a773-0282b6f3fce8": {
        "role": "comment_only",
        "value": {
